basic.floral_language:
Sedum burrito
Floriography: pure, lovely, beautiful
Sedum burrito has a cute and exquisite shape, with pale green leaves in rice grain shape, plump and juicy, leaf surface covered with a thin layer of white powder. When sunny, leaves turn slightly red. Grows faster, can be used as a hanging plant.
Sedum burrito likes sun light, short dormancy in summer heat, shade properly under scattered light. Flowers sometimes with pink flowers.
basic.blooming: Succulent plants, sometimes flowers, pink flowers
basic.color: Leaf color light green, when sunny leaf color slightly turning to red

maintenance.soil: Peat and akadama mixed in 3:1 ratio
maintenance.sunlight: Like adequate sunlight, dormant in summer under high temperatures, put in places with scattered light
maintenance.watering: Keep soil moist, water thoroughly when soil is dry
maintenance.fertilization: Dilute fertilizers following instructions,  apply once monthly in spring and autumn
maintenance.pruning: Remove dead and rotten part timely
